sentences.simplifiedText: 我住的这个楼的物业非常好.
sentences.traditionalText: 我住的這個樓的物業非常好.
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ zhù de zhègè lóu de wùyè fēicháng hǎo.
sentences.translation: The property management of the building I live in is very good.

sentences.simplifiedText: 物业管理人员每天都在检查公共设施，确保我们住得舒适.
sentences.traditionalText: 物業管理人員每天都在檢查公共設施，確保我們住得舒適.
sentences.pinyin: Wùyè guǎnlǐ rényuán měi tiān dū zài jiǎnchá gōnggòng shèshī, quèbǎo wǒmen zhù dé shūshì.
sentences.translation: The property management staff inspect the public facilities every day to ensure that we live comfortably.
